BS_Bash.display_help: You Bash with your mace dealing moderate Smashing damage and minor Toxic damage over time. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Bane Spider Cloaking Device. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Fast
BS_Bash.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Foe Disorient
BS_Bash.display_target_help: You have been disoriented and poisoned.

Mace_Beam.display_help: The Nullifier Mace has several different ranged attack modes. The Mace Beam is a moderate damage single target attack with a chance to knock a foe off their feet. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Fast

Mace_Beam_Blast.display_help: The Nullifier Mace is capable of firing a tremendous bolt of force from the end of it. The Mace Beam Blast is a Light damage area of effect attack, foes struck by the blast may be knocked back. Damage: Light Recharge: Medium
Mace_Beam_Blast.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Light DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockback

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Slow

messages.display_attacker_hit: You tap into your inner strength with your {PowerName} and are more accurate and more deadly for a short while.

Mace_Beam_Volley.display_help: The Nullifier Mace can fire a volley of energy at all foes in front of the user. The Mace Beam Volley is a Moderate damage area of effect cone attack with a chance to knock foes off their feet. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Medium
Mace_Beam_Volley.display_short_help: Ranged Cone, Moderate DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockback

Pulverize.display_help: You are capable of Pulverizing a foe with your Nullifier Mace dealing high damage, causing toxic damage over time. Pulverize will occasionally disorient foes as well. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Bane Spider Cloaking Device. Damage: High Recharge: Moderate
Pulverize.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Foe Disorient
Pulverize.display_target_help: You have been disoriented and poisoned.

Poisonous_Ray.display_help: You fire a Poisonous Ray from your mace causing damage over time as reducing the target's defense. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Moderate
Poisonous_Ray.display_target_help: You have been poisoned and your defense has been reduced.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.

Shatter.display_help: You attempt to Shatter the bones of your opponent by striking them with all your might. This attack will deal great damage and can knock foes back a great ways. NOTE: This power will deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Bane Spider Cloaking Device. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Shatter.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), High Knockback

Placate.display_help: Allow you to trick a foe to no longer attack you. A successful Placate will also Hide you. This Hide is very brief, and offers no Defense bonus, but it will allow you to deliver a Critical Hit. However, if you attack a Placated Foe, they will be able to attack you back. Recharge: Long

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} has Placated you.

Crowd_Control.display_help: You swing your mace in a wide arc in front of you. This attack strikes all foes within melee range, deals them serious damage and minor Toxic damage over time, and knocks them down. NOTE: This power may deal critical damage if used after a successful Placate or while the user is hidden with the Bane Spider Cloaking Device. Damage: High Recharge: Moderate
Crowd_Control.display_short_help: Melee (Cone), High DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Foe Knockback
